mapper.insert: insert into t_cron_task (ID, job_name, cron_expr, job_desc, job_class, effect_flag, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jobName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cronExpr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jobDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jobClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{effectFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=DATE})
mapper.update: update t_cron_task set job_name = #{jobName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cron_expr = #{cronExpr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, job_desc = #{jobDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, job_class = #{jobClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, effect_flag = #{effectFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=DATE} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, job_name, cron_expr, job_desc, job_class, effect_flag, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time from t_cron_task where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select ID, job_name, cron_expr, job_desc, job_class, effect_flag, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time from t_cron_task where job_name = #{jobName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
